centralauth-admin-no-unified: Ii sadasya ke koi unified username nai hae.
centralauth-admin-permission: Khaali stewards duusra log ke account ke uu logan ke khatir merge kare sake hae.
centralauth-antispoof-desc: AntiSpoof technology ke CentralAuth me jorre hae
centralauth-complete-text: Ab aap {{int:Centralauth-groupname}} wiki ke koi site me, bina nawaa accoun banae, login kare saktaa hae.
centralauth-disabled-dryrun:
Account unification abhi demo / debugging mode me hae, tab asli merging operations disabled hae.
Maaf karna!
centralauth-error-locked: Aap edit nai kare saktaa hae kaahe ki aap ke account locked hae.
centralauth-error-unmerged: Aap edit nai kare saktaa hae kaahe ki aap ke account unified nai hae.
centralauth-incomplete-text: Jab aap ke account ke unify kar dewa jaai tab aap {{int:Centralauth-groupname}} ke koi wiki site me, bina nawaa account banae, login kare sakega.
centralauth-list-home-dryrun: Jon password aur email address ii wiki me set karaa gais hae, ke aap ke unified account me use karaa jaai.
centralauth-merge-denied: Maaf karna, aap ke ii panna access kare ke adhikar nai hae
centralauth-merge-method-mail: email se confirm karaa gais hae
centralauth-merge-method-password: password se confirm karaa gais hae
centralauth-merge-method-primary-desc:
Ii uu wiki hae jisme sccounts ke pahile merge kar dewa jaae hae.
Dhyan rakhna ke ii aslii home wiki se different hoe sake hae.
centralauth-merge-notlogged: Mrharbani kar ke [$1 log in karo] ii check kare ke khatir ii aap ke sab account ke merge kar dewa gais ki nai.
centralauth-mergeaccount-desc: [[Special:MergeAccount|Merges multiple accounts]] for Single User Login
